audio_pause_sound: With this function you can pause any sound that is currently playing. The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be paused.
The index of the sound to pause.

The above code checks for a press of the keyboard key "P" and if it detects one it sets the global variable "Pause" to <tt>true</tt> or false and then either pauses the sound indexed in the variable "snd_Waterfall" or it resumes the sound from its paused state.
